channel.title: On IOS, duplicated insertion of quote marks, etc
channel.description: Hi. I’ve been noticing the last week or so that attempts to insert inverted commas, quote marks and similar result in a double insert of those punctuation marks. Using IOS 14.4.2 and Drafts 26.0.37.
